general_info.summary: This document appears to be a table of contents or a list of various sections and programs offered by Sharda University, covering academic offerings, administrative reports, student services, skill development initiatives, and international campuses. It includes details on dental sciences, medical research, nursing, examinations, curriculum feedback, university publications, leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, and specific student support services like visa guidelines and counseling.

career_opportunities.summary: This text outlines the application process for a course in basic sciences, detailing potential career paths such as Chemistry/Physics Lab Assistant, Physics Mentor, and Physics Training Manager. It also highlights the typical starting salary range of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA for graduates and mentions recruiters associated with the program.
career_opportunities.raw_content:
How to apply for the course?
Career path you can choose after the course
• Chemistry/ Physics Lab Assistant
• Physics Mentor
• Physics Training Manager
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in basic sciences.
